title: Inter-Market Arbitrage Opportunity Alert
description: An agent continuously monitors prices between two adjacent electricity markets and identifies a significant price separation, creating an arbitrage opportunity.

tasks.description: Monitor real-time LMPs in Market A and Market B.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent detects that the price in Market B is $50/MWh higher than in Market A.

tasks.description: Check the available transmission capacity on the tie-line connecting the two markets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there is 100 MW of available transmission capacity.

tasks.description: Calculate the potential profit from buying power in Market A and selling it in Market B, after accounting for transmission fees.
Execute the simultaneous buy and sell trades to capture the arbitrage.
